name: Controlled by music
description:
In this puzzle game you play the flute to controll your robot to your cage.

Setup the notes to for the actions you need and press play to start playing the flute.

Up/Down/Left/Right: Robot walks one step in this direction.

Use: Robot picks up the key or unlocks the cage when standing on it.

Edit: I discovered that you have to reload the side after completing one level because the levels are somehow bugged!
